author: Tal Axelrod
title: Maine lawmaker to protest coronavirus restrictions in front of governor's mansion
description: A Maine lawmaker is planning to join protesters next week who are demonstrating against the state's stay-at-home order as similar protests play out across the country against state and local social distancing measures....
content:
A Maine lawmaker is planning to join protesters next week who are demonstrating against the states stay-at-home order as similar protests play out across the country against state and local social distancing measures.
